title: Stargazing

description.plain:
“Stargazing” is the breakout single from British singer-songwriter Myles Smith. The song was released on May 10th, 2024 and has peaked at #34 on the Billboard Hot 100 as of October 12th, 2024.

Smith stated that he was inspired to write “something really warm, fun and happy” during a visit to Malibu, California. The song has been used in over 50,000 videos on Tiktok, where the official audio was released on April 21st, 2024.

embed_content: Read “Stargazing” by Myles Smith on Genius

Smith stated that he was inspired to write “something really warm, fun and happy” during a visit to Malibu, California. The song has been used in over 50,000 videos on Tiktok, where the official audio was released on April 21st, 2024.
